Understate: Ramaphosa understated growth in the poultry industry)
Lack enough support: Ramaphosa's claim about citrus exports cannot be proven)
Falters at times: Ramaphosa's claim about the poultry industry investment is contradicted by industry reports)
Problematic assumption: Ramaphosa assumed that the poultry industry invested R800 million, but it was actually R1.1 billion)
Exist alternative explanation: The association obtained their statistics from an audit of chicken producers, suggesting an alternative explanation for the poultry industry's investment)
